keyPolicies.policyTitle: Bringing jobs and investment to Southampton
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Work has been done since 2010, but there is more to do. As your MP, I will continue to introduce the city to employers, coach leaders in the business community, and work regionally to bring even more investment to our city.

issues.economy: Bringing jobs and investment to Southampton

images.caption: Royston Smith in various interactions and activities.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Pledging to promote Southampton nationally and internationally to bring more jobs and investment to the city.
